mapper.select: SELECT tmp.serverSum AS serverSum, tmp.serverOnLineSum AS serverOnLineSum, tmp.serverOffLineSum AS serverOffLineSum, tmp.serverUnknownLineSum AS serverUnknownLineSum, IFNULL(ROUND(tmp.serverOnLineSum * 100 / tmp.serverSum, 2), '100.00') AS serverOnLineRate FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS serverSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ms.IS_ONLINE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS serverOnLineSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ms.IS_ONLINE = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS serverOffLineSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ms.IS_ONLINE IS NULL OR ms.IS_ONLINE = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS serverUnknownLineSum FROM MONITOR_SERVER ms) tmp

SELECT S.*, O.OS_NAME, CAST(AVG(1 - CPU.CPU_IDLE) * 100 AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS CPU_USER_PERCENT, CAST(AVG(MEMORY.MEN_USED_PERCENT) * 100 AS DECIMAL(10, 2)) AS MEN_USED_PERCENT, NETCARD.DOWNLOAD_BPS, NETCARD.UPLOAD_BPS, AVERAGE.FIFTEEN AS LOAD_AVERAGE FROM MONITOR_SERVER S LEFT JOIN MONITOR_SERVER_OS O ON O.IP = S.IP LEFT JOIN MONITOR_SERVER_CPU CPU ON CPU.IP = S.IP LEFT JOIN MONITOR_SERVER_MEMORY MEMORY ON MEMORY.IP = S.IP LEFT JOIN (SELECT IP, ADDRESS, MAX(DOWNLOAD_BPS) AS DOWNLOAD_BPS, MAX(UPLOAD_BPS) AS UPLOAD_BPS FROM MONITOR_SERVER_NETCARD GROUP BY IP, ADDRESS) NETCARD ON (NETCARD.IP = S.IP AND NETCARD.ADDRESS = S.IP) LEFT JOIN MONITOR_SERVER_LOAD_AVERAGE AVERAGE ON AVERAGE.IP = S.IP GROUP BY S.ID, S.IP, S.SERVER_NAME, S.SERVER_SUMMARY, S.IS_ONLINE, S.CONN_FREQUENCY, S.INSERT_TIME, S.UPDATE_TIME, O.OS_NAME, NETCARD.DOWNLOAD_BPS, NETCARD.UPLOAD_BPS, AVERAGE.FIFTEEN ORDER BY S.ID
